data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Benoit Bastien signals a Lyon throw-in in PSG's half.
In the minute 1, Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for PSG in their own half.
Benoit Bastien awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 3, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
In the minute 6, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
PSG's Alessandro Florenzi breaks free at Parc des Princes. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Lyon have a goal kick.
In the minute 7, Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for PSG at Parc des Princes.
Free kick PSG.
In the minute 9, It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
Throw-in PSG.
Houssem Aouar (Lyon) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 12, Free kick for PSG in the half of Lyon.
Benoit Bastien awards Lyon a goal kick.
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 15, Corner awarded to Lyon.
Important block from the PSG defence as Marcelo fires in a strike for Lyon.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in Lyon.
PSG are coming forward and Mitchel Bakker gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Lyon at Parc des Princes.
In the minute 18, PSG have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
PSG's Angel Di Maria misses with an attempt on goal.
Lyon have a goal kick.
In the minute 19, Benoit Bastien awards the home team a throw-in.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
In the minute 22, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
Can Lyon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Lyon drives forward and Tino Kadewere gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 23, Lyon are caught offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 27, Goal kick for PSG at Parc des Princes.
Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
The home team replace Abdou Diallo with Thilo Kehrer.
In the minute 30, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to Lyon.
Ball goes out of play for a PSG goal kick.
Free kick for PSG in their own half.
In the minute 32, In Paris a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Benoit Bastien signals a throw-in for Lyon, close to PSG's area.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
In the minute 35, Tino Kadewere of Lyon gets in a strike, but is off target.
Benoit Bastien awards PSG a goal kick.
Tino Kadewere puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 35, Great play from Karl Toko Ekambi to set up the goal.
Throw-in for PSG at Parc des Princes.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, At Parc des Princes, PSG are penalized for being offside.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of PSG.
Free kick for PSG in the half of Lyon.
In the minute 38, Leo Dubois is booked for the away team.
Corner awarded to PSG.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Paris.
In the minute 42, Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alessandro Florenzi of PSG smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to PSG.
PSG to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
In Paris a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in high up the field for PSG in Paris.
The first half has been concluded at Parc des Princes.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Ball safe as PSG is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Lyon.
In the minute 46, Thilo Kehrer (PSG) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of PSG.
PSG awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Thiago Mendes gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lyon.
PSG are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 56, Leandro Paredes (PSG) has received a yellow card from Benoit Bastien.
Attention is being given to Lyon’s Memphis Depay and play has been suspended briefly.
Memphis Depay is back on his feet again.
In the minute 60, Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
Benoit Bastien signals a PSG throw-in in Lyon's half.
Throw-in Lyon.
In the minute 62, Can PSG get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lyon's half?
In Paris, Angel Di Maria of PSG is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Lyon at Parc des Princes.
Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
Thomas Tuchel is making the team's second substitution at Parc des Princes with Ander Herrera replacing Marco Verratti.
In the minute 65, Kylian Mbappe is on a sub for Angel Di Maria for PSG.
Idrissa Gueye is replacing Leandro Paredes for the home team.
Lyon make their first substitution with Mattia De Sciglio replacing Leo Dubois.
In the minute 66, Benoit Bastien awards the away team a throw-in.
Lyon's Lucas Paqueta is on target but unsuccessful.
Lyon surge into the attack at Parc des Princes but Karl Toko Ekambi’s header is off-target.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the home team in Paris.
Lyon push upfield but Benoit Bastien quickly pulls them for offside.
Free kick in a good position for PSG!
In the minute 71, PSG have a dangerous throw-in.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Neymar (PSG) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 72, Play has been interrupted briefly in Paris to check on Anthony Lopes, who is grimacing with pain.
Rafinha is replacing Moise Kean for PSG at Parc des Princes.
Anthony Lopes is back on the pitch.
In the minute 74, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to PSG in their own half.
PSG have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
Alessandro Florenzi (PSG) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 76, Benoit Bastien signals a free kick to PSG.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
Rudi Garcia (Lyon) is making a second substitution, with Sinaly Diomande replacing Tino Kadewere.
In the minute 78, Moussa Dembele is replacing Memphis Depay for the away team.
Bruno Guimaraes is on a sub for Houssem Aouar for Lyon.
Benoit Bastien awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 80, Throw-in PSG.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Lyon have been awarded a corner by Benoit Bastien.
In the minute 82, Lyon drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Free kick PSG.
PSG's Danilo Pereira attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 84, Ball goes out of play for a Lyon goal kick.
Throw-in for PSG at Parc des Princes.
Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 87, Rafinha (PSG) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, PSG to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
Lyon make their fifth substitution with Maxence Caqueret replacing Lucas Paqueta.
Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
Throw-in for PSG close to the penalty box.
Lyon's Bruno Guimaraes gets in a shot on goal at Parc des Princes. But the effort is unsuccessful.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Paris.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
Lyon push forward at Parc des Princes and Maxwel Cornet gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined PSG defence.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in PSG's half?
PSG are pushing forward but Kylian Mbappe's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Lyon at Parc des Princes.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lyon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lyon needs to be cautious. PSG have an attacking throw-in.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Paris a free kick has been awarded the home team.
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-1.
Presnel Kimpembe (PSG) has received a first yellow card.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Neymar.
He's off! Thiago Mendes is shown a red card.
